Troubleshooting
===============

Common Issues
-------------

1. **Python cannot find modules**
   Make sure you ran:
   .. code-block:: bash

      pip install -r requirements.txt

2. **Config files not loading**
   Ensure all YAML files are inside:
   ``config/controls/*.yml``

3. **Docs not building**
   Run from inside the docs folder:
   .. code-block:: bash

      make.bat html

Support
-------

Open an issue on GitHub:

https://github.com/ksowu1/it-audit-control-simulator/issues
